DataElement.preferredDefinition: Further or repeated use of equipment, instruments, devices, or materials. It includes additional use regardless of the original intent of the producer as to disposability or durability. It does not include the repeated use of fluids or solutions.A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._Information regarding the means of contacting a person or group._The string of characters that represents an electronic mail address.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: contact information for communications over distance, including telephone and fax numbers, e-mail, and web addresses.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The string of characters that represents an electronic mail address. [Explanatory comment:  The format for this value domain is the SMTP standard local-part@domain]
